title: How Green Hydrogen Is Made
sub_head: Burning hydrogen doesn’t create carbon-dioxide emissions. But creating hydrogen can.
body: Hydrogen has promise as a fuel that burns without creating greenhouse gases. But the production of hydrogen isn’t necessarily as clean. Only 1% of current hydrogen production is produced from renewable sources, according to the International Energy Agency. Here’s a look at some of the major production processes, which are often differentiated by color.
